line_1: And teach his wishes greatly to aspire;
line_2: Rouse ev'ry passion, wake each fond desire,

line_1: Instruct him, goddess, on his native plain,
line_2: To sing the glories of a George's reign;

line_1: To sing the glories of a George's reign;
line_2: Instruct him, goddess, on his native plain,

line_1: Tell him, at his command you sought their shore,
line_2: Their wrongs to pity, and their rights restore;

line_1: Their wrongs to pity, and their rights restore;
line_2: Tell him, at his command you sought their shore,

line_1: Through the blue concave thy white flag unfurl'd,
line_2: And arm thy bands to prop a sinking world.

line_1: And arm thy bands to prop a sinking world.
line_2: Through the blue concave thy white flag unfurl'd,
